QuestData.Title: Pebble
QuestData.Description: If you hadn't noticed, there's a very small elemental that has taken a liking to you. If you stay on the ground for even a few moments, I'm sure you'll spot him.$B$BYou seem to be quite adept at making friends down here. A good talent to have.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Pebble in the Shuddering Spires. If you stay on the ground long enough, he should come out of hiding to find you.
QuestData.RewardText: <Pebble seems quite happy to meet you.>
